wikipedia_page.main: John Grenville Bernard Watson   (born 21 February 1943) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom.

Since 1983 Craven has been in the Parliamentary constituency of Skipton & Ripon. This constituency is considered one of the safest seats in England with a long history of Conservative representation. The Member of Parliament (MP) was: John Watson 1983 to 1987; David Curry 1987 to 2010; Julian Smith since 2010; and still Craven’s Member of Parliament in 2020

Curry was elected to the House of Commons for the safe Conservative seat of Skipton and Ripon at the 1987 general election on the retirement of the sitting Conservative MP John Watson.  Curry won the seat with a majority of 17,174 and held the seat safely until he retired from Parliament in 2010.
